summary: This module provides certificate status information for Apache's mod_md, which manages SSL/TLS certificates and OCSP stapling. It exposes endpoints for checking certificate status, managed domains, and OCSP stapling information, returning both JSON and HTML formats depending on the request.

logs.reason: Debug log when a certificate status request is received, indicating which hostname is being queried
A request was made with a method other than GET for the certificate status endpoint
logs.resolution: Use only GET method for certificate status endpoints. Client may need to update their API call method.

logs.reason: Debug log indicating a managed domain's status is being requested
Error occurred when trying to load status information for a managed domain. This is an important error condition.
logs.resolution: Check that the Apache MD store is accessible and not corrupted. Verify file permissions and disk space. May require restarting the Apache server or rebuilding the MD database.

logs.reason: Debug log showing the complete status JSON for a managed domain
Debug log indicating that certificate status information is being sent as a response
Debug log indicating the start of collecting status information for all managed domains
Debug log indicating that non-HTML (plain text) status summary is being generated

logs.message_template: got JSON managed domain status summary
logs.reason: Debug log indicating successful retrieval of domain status summary in JSON format
Debug log indicating successful retrieval of detailed domain status in JSON format
Debug log indicating that HTML format status table is being generated
Debug log indicating that the code is processing each domain in the status collection
Debug log indicating the completion of collecting status for all managed domains
Debug log indicating the start of collecting OCSP stapling status information
Debug log indicating that non-HTML (plain text) OCSP status summary is being generated

logs.message_template: got JSON ocsp stapling status summary
logs.reason: Debug log indicating successful retrieval of OCSP status summary in JSON format
Debug log indicating successful retrieval of detailed OCSP status in JSON format
Debug log indicating that HTML format OCSP status table is being generated
Debug log indicating that the code is processing each OCSP entry in the status collection
Debug log indicating the completion of collecting OCSP stapling status
A request was made with a method other than GET for the md-status endpoint
logs.resolution: Use only GET method for md-status endpoints. Client may need to update their API call method.

logs.reason: Status report indicating a certificate is incomplete with details about why
logs.resolution: Check certificate configuration and verify the certificate acquisition process. The specific error message will provide more details about what's missing.

logs.reason: An error occurred during certificate renewal or OCSP update processing
logs.resolution: Check the specific error message and address the underlying issue. May involve checking network connectivity, ACME server status, DNS configuration, or file permissions.
